subScenes.name: 问候与开场
subScenes.description: 员工礼貌问候财务经理并开启报销咨询

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi Sarah, hope you're doing well!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嗨，莎拉，希望你最近不错！

responses.text: I'm good, thanks! I've got a few questions about expense reimbursement.
responses.text_cn: 我很好，谢谢！我有几个关于报销的问题。

responses.text: Doing great! Can you help me with my trip expenses?
responses.text_cn: 挺好的！能帮我处理下差旅报销吗？

responses.text: Yeah, thanks. Need to submit my receipts.
responses.text_cn: 嗯，谢谢，得交报销单了。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用轻松语气开场，拉近距离

subScenes.name: 询问系统登录
subScenes.description: 员工询问报销系统登录方式和账号

qaPairs.speakerText: How do I log into the expense system? I forgot my password.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 报销系统怎么登录？我忘记密码了。

responses.text: You can reset it via the portal—just click 'Forgot Password'.
responses.text_cn: 去门户点‘忘记密码’重置就行。

responses.text: The system's on the company intranet. Need me to send you the link?
responses.text_cn: 系统在内网，要我发你链接吗？

responses.text: Just use your work email.
responses.text_cn: 用你工号邮箱登录就行。

qaPairs.usageNote: 主动提供解决方案更高效

subScenes.name: 上传发票与要求
subScenes.description: 员工确认发票上传格式和注意事项

qaPairs.speakerText: Do I need to scan all receipts? What format should they be?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 所有收据都要扫描吗？要什么格式？

responses.text: Yes, PDF or JPG only—no photos from your phone camera.
responses.text_cn: 必须PDF或JPG，别发手机拍的原图。

responses.text: Scan them clearly and name files like 'Flight_July15.pdf'.
responses.text_cn: 清晰扫描，文件名写成‘航班_7月15日.pdf’。

responses.text: Just upload everything.
responses.text_cn: 全传上去就行。

qaPairs.speakerText: Can I submit partial receipts if I lost one?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 如果丢了张发票，能只报部分吗？

responses.text: Unfortunately, no—without a receipt, it won't be approved.
responses.text_cn: 不行，没发票一律不批。

responses.text: You can submit a signed statement, but only for under $50.
responses.text_cn: 可写说明，但限50美元以内。

responses.text: Try asking the vendor for a copy.
responses.text_cn: 试试找商家补一张。

subScenes.name: 审批流程与时间
subScenes.description: 员工询问报销审批周期和到账时间

qaPairs.speakerText: How long does approval usually take?

responses.text: About 3–5 business days after submission.
responses.text_cn: 提交后3到5个工作日。

responses.text: If your manager's away, it might take longer.
responses.text_cn: 如果经理出差，会拖久点。

responses.text: A week.
responses.text_cn: 一周左右。

qaPairs.speakerText: When will the money hit my account?

responses.text: Within 2 days after approval—payroll runs every Friday.
responses.text_cn: 审批后两天内到账，工资周五发。

responses.text: Depends on the bank, but usually same week.
responses.text_cn: 看银行，一般当周就能到。

responses.text: Next pay cycle.
responses.text_cn: 下个发薪日。

qaPairs.usageNote: 结合发薪周期说明更清晰

subScenes.name: 道别与感谢
subScenes.description: 员工结束咨询并礼貌致谢

qaPairs.speakerText: Thanks so much for your help, Sarah!

responses.text: No problem! Just email me if anything's unclear.
responses.text_cn: 不客气，有疑问随时邮件我。

responses.text: Anytime! Have a great rest of your week.
responses.text_cn: 随时找我！祝你这周愉快。

responses.text: Sure thing.
responses.text_cn: 没问题。

qaPairs.usageNote: 结尾表达感谢提升职场形象
